notes: SeaDataNet Temperature and Salinity historical data collection for the North Arctic Ocean, including revised quality flags after quality control with ODV. For data access please register at http://www.marine-id.org The dataset format is ODV binary collections. You can read, analyse and export from the ODV application provided by Alfred Wegener institute at http://odv.awi.de/
title: Arctic Ocean - Temperature and salinity observation collection V2
